p: HIV epidemics have recently undergone a rapid shift in transmission profile in China. High-risk populations of HIV infection have changed several times from the initial injecting drug users (IDUs), former plasma donors, sexual workers, MSMs, to the general population [ 1]. Together with the shift in predominant transmission routes, major HIV subtypes in China have also changed from subtype Thai B, subtype C, CRF07_BC, and CRF08_BC to CRF01_AE [ 2]. Considering that HIV epidemics in China continue to evolve and thus it is important to improve its surveillance.
